title: Lava Beds National Monument: Education
body: Lava Beds: An Above and Below Ground Classroom Let Lava Beds become your outdoor classroom! During a field trip to Lava Beds, students can explore lava tube caves, walk in the footsteps of Modoc warriors and US Army soldiers, ponder the meaning of ancient rock art and encounter a wide variety of plants and wildlife.                 Plan Your Field Trip Everything you need to plan a field trip your students will never forget! Read More        Ranger Led Education Programs School groups can enhance their visit to Lava Beds by requesting a ranger led education program, that focues on cultural or natural history. Read More        Traveling Trunks Bring Lava Beds to your classroom through the loan of our traveling trunks.  Trunk topics include cultural history, caves, geology, bats & Birds. Read More        Teacher - Ranger - Teacher Help Lava Beds grow its education program by being a TRT for the summer. Applications are due May 1, 2016! Read More
